name: kimai
description: Kimai is a web based time tracking application for individuals and teams. It logs working hours against projects and activities, produces invoices and reports, and can be self hosted for agencies or freelancers needing detailed time records.

features.title: Project Management
features.description: Organize work into projects, activities, and tasks. Structure time tracking logically

features.title: Client Management
features.description: Manage clients, billing rates, and contact information. Organize customer relationships

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multi-user support with individual and team timesheet views. Track time across organization

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Detailed time reports, project summaries, and profitability analysis. Understand productivity patterns

features.title: Budget Management
features.description: Set project budgets and track spending against limits. Control project costs
